mapper.insert: insert into mycloud_register (account, username, password, role, gmt_create, gmt_modified, tele_num, email) values (#{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now(), #{teleNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update mycloud_register
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
